page.title: 03SHOPS AND TOURISM
page.content: THE VILLAGE OF BATTLE CONTAINS MANY TYPES OF{SHOP.}WE ASKED THE OWNERS OF SEVERAL GIFT SHOPS ABOUT TRADE IN A{TOURIST}AREA. MOST TOLD US THAT THE BUSIEST TIME OF THE YEAR WAS BETWEEN EASTER AND SEPTEMBER, WITH ANOTHER RUSH JUST BEFORE CHRISTMAS. MOST TOURISTS BUY ONLY SMALL SOUVENIERS SUCH AS POTTERY ORNAMENTS OR SWEETS BUT THOSE FROM ABROAD, ESPECIALLY FROM THE U.S.A. SPENT MUCH MORE AND FAVOURED ANTIQUES OR PRINTS OF THE ABBEY. MOST OF THE TOURIST SHOPS ARE AS NEAR THE ABBEY GATE AS POSSIBLE BECAUSE TOURISTS TEND TO GO INTO THE FIRST SHOPS THEY SEE. THEY DO NOT SEEM TO GO DOWN THE SIDE STREETS VERY OFTEN PERHAPS BECAUSE THEY ARE SCARED OF GETTING LOST.
